title: Captain Tsubasa - Rising Sun - Finals
alternative_title: Captain Tsubasa - Rising Sun - Part 3 ; キャプテン翼ライジングサン   F I N A L S ; Capitán Tsubasa - Rising Sun - FINALS ; Đội trưởng Tsubasa - Mặt trời mọc - Chung kết
status: Captain Tsubasa - Rising Sun - Part 3 ; キャプテン翼ライジングサン   F I N A L S ; Capitán Tsubasa - Rising Sun - FINALS ; Đội trưởng Tsubasa - Mặt trời mọc - Chung kết
description:
Description :
        A web-comic continuation of Captain Tsubasa 9th arc: Rising Sun - The Final.Rising Sun - FINALS is covering the 2nd half of the Madrid Olympics match of Japan VS. Spain and beyond.The web-comic came to be when on April 2024 mangaka Yoichi Takahashi announced his retirement, ending Rising Sun - The Final official published serialization half-way through the match opting to continue the story at his own pace with storyboard pencil sketches, publishing them on the official Captain Tsubasa World website.

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 9: The Golden Generation's All-Out Attack!!
